name: HotelZ
description:
Defend yourselves from zombies with a machine gun, a flamethrower and grenades. But make sure you or the zombies don't destroy too much of the room, the Hotel will make you pay for that!

WASD TO WALK

LEFT CLICK TO SHOOT

SPACE TO SWITCH CHARACTERS

A game by Ajmal Rizni (https://twitter.com/AjmalRizni)

With sound design by Craig Barnes (https://twitter.com/cbstegeman)

Rate it here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=56430
